title: NYDJ Women's Teresa Trouser Jean
description: Made with Lift Tuck Technology to flatten in the front and flatter curves in the back.
Made using earth-friendly production methods that result in a reduction in consumption of water, chemicals and/or energy.
Zip fly and button closure; five-pocket styling; 1 1/2" hems
Machine wash cold and line dry.
One way to stand out is to rock a bold, trendsetting pair of jeans. The teresa trouser by NYDJ don't just stand out - they steal the show.
